full_summary:
Equipment and Services for Window Replacement at William Head Institution
===========================================================

### Tender Details

* **Contract Title:** EZ899-241504 – Window Replacement for Building 103, William Head Institution
* **Reference Number:** WS4403666856-Doc4404054008
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4403666856
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-02-05 14:00:00 Mountain Standard Time (UTC-7)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-03-15
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-03-08

### Contract Requirements

Correctional Services Canada (CSC) is seeking a contractor to provide services for the replacement of windows at CSC William Head Institution Building 103. The successful bidder will be responsible for providing all necessary labor, materials, services, and equipment for the project.

### Tender Evaluation

The tender will be evaluated based on the lowest price submitted by the bidder.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Regions of Opportunity

The project is located in British Columbia, Canada.

### How to Respond

Interested contractors must submit their bids electronically through [insert link to online tender portal]. The bid submission deadline is February 5, 2024, at 14:00:00 Mountain Standard Time (UTC-7). For more information and additional contract requirements, please refer to the documentation provided.

### Point of Contact

For any inquiries or questions related to this tender, please contact:

Allison, Rodnie (Contracting Authority)

Email: [rodnie.allison@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:rodnie.allison@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
 Tel: None
 Fax: None
